message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I can sell it to you for $97.50. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. How about $92? I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob! I'm willing to make another compromise. I can sell it to you for $94.50. It's a small increase from my previous offer, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.

I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell it to you for $96. I'm confident you'll love the product, and I think this price is fair for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time, so how about $92? If not, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one final compromise. I can sell it to you for $97.50. It's the highest price I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.

I've made several offers, and you've rejected them all. I'm willing to make one last attempt. I'll meet you at $90, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to sell it to me for $90, I'll have to consider other options.
